Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1982...
Injured on 4/18/1983 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 5/14/1986, off Roger Erickson (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1987, off Jimmy Key (PIT)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1989...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 6/21/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1991, hitting .579 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 7/20/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1993, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (N) on 4/2/1994...
Injured on 5/28/1995 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 3-4 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against St. Louis, driving in 5 runs on 9/4/1995...
Injured on 4/18/1998 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 7 weeks...
